BBDP1.A.DE.N.VPI.C.A00000.I10.L: Consumer price index / Germany / Unadjusted figure / Total

General: Up to 1961: price index for the standard of living of four-person households of workers and salaried staff with average incomes,                                          1962-1999: price index for the standard of living of all private households,                                       as of 2000: consumer price index.
